string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo Protecting the Peach Tree
The proud protector of Peach Farm, #b#p2091003##k, has something he really wants...

#p2091003# wants to find a medicine that really speeds up the growth of Peach Tree. #p2091002# is a master at making these medicines, but he can't ask the owner of the Peach Farm to make the medicine for him, so he's asking me to get #b#t4031554##k from #b#p2090004##k...\n\n#i4031554##t4031554# #b#c4031554##k/1
I was able to obtain the medicine from #p2090004# and gave it to #p2091003#. Phew~ making a medicine through #p2090004# must be much more difficult than protecting the great Peach Tree~
여행자님이신가보죠? 반가워요. 여행자님이 보시기에 #m250000000#은 어떤가요? 평화롭고 좋은 마을 아닌가요? 이 마을 분들은 아무런 걱정 없이 선인이 되기 위한 수행을 하는 게 보통이랍니다. 이 마을에서 고민에 빠져 있는 건 아마 저밖에 없을 거예요.
무슨 고민이냐고요? 전 과수원지기예요. 과수원지기면 바쁘지 않을 것 같다고 생각하시는 분들이 많지만, 사실 안 그래요. 무지 바빠요. 왜냐면 천도 과수원의 천도는 노리는 녀석들이 너무 많아서 지키기 어렵거든요. 괜찮으시면 여행자님께서 도와주면 안될까요?
별로 어려운 일은 아니예요. 천도를 따 먹는 녀석들이 너무 많아서 천도나무가 잘 자라지 못하고 있으니 약을 주려고 해요. 그러니 여행자님께서 #t4031554#을 구해다 주셨으면 해요.
하지만 #p2091002#님께 부탁하는 건 안돼요. #p2091002#님은 이 #m250000000#에서 제일 가는 약재사이시지만, 그 분은 천도 과수원의 주인이기도 하신걸요. 천도나무에 약을 줘야 한다는 걸 알게 되시면 무척 화를 내실 거예요. 그러니 미덥지는 못하지만 #p2090004#님께 약을 구해 주세요. 그럼 부탁 드릴게요.
하긴. #m250000000# 구경에도 바쁘신 분께 괜한 부탁을 드렸네요.

You must be a traveler, right? Great to see you! What's your first impression on #m250000000#? Don't you think this town seems very peaceful and serene? It's not uncommon to find people who are totally content with their lives, training diligently to become a true Master. I might be the only one here who's always concerned about something.

What am I worried about? Well, I'm the official protector of this great Peach Farm. Many people think we have nothing to do, and just sit down, lie down, and chat with the neighbors, but that's so not true. We're really busy, as a matter of fact. The problem is, Peach Farm is always saddled with animals looking to steal some Peaches from the Farm. Can you help me out if you can?

It's not a difficult task actually. So many creatures have plucked the Peaches from the farm, and as a result, the Peach Tree isn't growing like it's supposed to. That's why I've decided to give the tree a 'supplement', and I want you to get #b#t4031554##k for me and for the trees.

I have to warn you, though, PLEASE don't ask #p2091002# for this. #p2091002# is the best pharmacist here in #m250000000#, but is also the owner of the Peach Farm. He will not be pleased if he hears that I plan on giving the Peach Tree some boost. That's why, although I can't completely trust him, please ask #b#p2090004##k for the medicine. Thank you!
Well, I mean... maybe I asked a wrong person for this. Afterall, you may be swamped with visiting #m250000000#.
Whoa!! Did #p2090004# really give you the medicine? It's not an everyday occurance that he created the medicine, free from errors. This is just incredible! Thank you so so much!!

For you to find a way to receive a perfectly-made medicine from #p2090004#, you must be one special traveler. Thanks to your awesome work, the Peach Trees will have no trouble growing. Thank you so much!
I don't think you got #b#t4031554##k yet. I mean, I understand that... #b#p2090004##k's work is questionable at best.
